overview:
Brian is CEO of ComposeTheFuture, and is determined to empower everyone to take control of and compose their own future.

After 30+ years in computing and telecoms, working for great startups and some of the worlds ICT giants, Brian has decided to buck the current economic downturn by creating his own startup.

Brian was most recently VP of Carrier Relations and Sales Solutions and Operations for Interoute, Europe’s fasted growing supplier of enterprise and telecom services. Previously Brian has worked for startup QoS Networks, a dotcom casualty, BT, Fujitsu, Banyan, and ITT.

Often seen at the Innovation Warehouse in London, Brian works closely with many of the startup groups around the Silicon Roundabout.

Brian has traveled around the world many times, and once took a year off from the computer industry to write a series of guidebooks on the USA for foreign visitors.

He lives with his gorgeous wife on the seafront in Whitstable, loves life, live music, and makes a semi-decent espresso.
